Remdesivir is a prodrug of the adenosine nucleotide analogue GS‐441524 that incorporates into nascent viral RNA chains, inhibiting virus infection in a human cell line (human liver cancer Huh 7 cells).
102 ,
103 It appears to be effective against RNA viruses SARS, MERS and Ebola.
103 In MERS‐CoV mouse models, it has been found to reduce the virus titre and improve lung tissue damage.
104 There are currently multiple phase III studies of remdesivir in COVID‐19 patients.
